channel.title: Swift on Uvolabs
channel.description: Recent content in Swift on Uvolabs

item.title: 100 Days of Swift: Day 2
item.description: Day 2 of 100: Started beefing up my knowledge on closures. Have always found this subject to be fairly bloated and nonintuitive, but I’m sure with enough practice it’ll become second nature. Closures as Parameters Can’t say I’m too fond of the idea of using () -> Void in my code. It looks very… nonSwifty. You’d think there would be a better syntax when your closure has no parameters or return values.

item.title: 100 Days of Swift: Day 1
item.description: Day 1 of The 100 Days of Swift Challenge Complete Gotta say I’m happily surprised by the amount of information I learned today. I studied my knowledge of some of the core Swift fundamentals on Hacking With Swift, and learned some new stuff about CoreML in iOS 12. Gonna keep on trucking and focus at least one hour a day for the next 99 days.
